Package pt.marquesmota

Class Rodeur

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.marquesmota.Joueur
      • pt.marquesmota.Rodeur
  • public class Rodeur
extends Joueur
    The Ranger character class.

    Creates the character object using the superclass constructor, manages the attacks, and print the object.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul Marques Mota
